entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
